## SphericalModel interface

Spherical component model

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SphericalModel<T = unknown> extends ComponentModel, ValueSource<T, SphericalValue> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ComponentModel](./tweak-ui.componentmodel.md)<!-- -->, [ValueSource](./tweak-ui.valuesource.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, [SphericalValue](./tweak-ui.sphericalvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [degree?](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.degree.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether to use degrees instead of radians |
|  [keys?](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.keys.md) | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> The object field names. Defaults to <code>['phi', 'theta']</code> |
|  [onChange?](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.onchange.md) | (model: [SphericalModel](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, value: [SphericalValue](./tweak-ui.sphericalvalue.md)<!-- -->, key?: string \| number) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> This is called once the control value is committed by the user. |
|  [onInput?](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.oninput.md) | (model: [SphericalModel](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, value: [SphericalValue](./tweak-ui.sphericalvalue.md)<!-- -->, key?: string \| number) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i> This is called when the control value has been changed. |
|  [type](./tweak-ui.sphericalmodel.type.md) | 'spherical' | The type name of the control |
